name: Dark Vileplume
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Perhaps because of their strong-smelling pollen, other Pokémon do not approach areas where Vileplumes live.

abilities.name: Hay Fever
abilities.effect: No Trainer cards can be played. This power stops working while Dark Vileplume is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Petal Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. If you get 2 or more heads, Dark Vileplume is now Confused (after doing damage).
